titles.title: For the relief of Adela T. and Darryl Bailor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 11/10/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum (determined by the Attorney General) to two named individuals as full compensation for all claims against the United States for injuries suffered by one such individual as a result of a rape and beating on May 9, 1991, by an inmate of the Federal correctional system in the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
